name: Cinderace
description: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

abilities.name: Crisis Power
abilities.effect: This Pokémon’s attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Fireball Shot
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.
